author: jacopoc
msg: Added new field "Current Retry Count" and logic to keep track of failed job executions; before this enhancement the check against maxRetry was done querying failed records and the approach had performance issues and could be unreliable because failed records can be purged. However the old mechanism is still used when the new field is not set for backward compatibility.
